mapper.select: SELECT store_seq AS storeSeq, member_id AS memberId, category, name, description, max_waiting_count AS maxWaitingCount, created_at AS createdAt, modified_at AS modifiedAt, address FROM store

SELECT store_seq AS storeSeq, member_id AS memberId, category, name, description, max_waiting_count AS maxWaitingCount, created_at AS createdAt, modified_at AS modifiedAt, address FROM store WHERE category = #{category}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store (member_id, category, name, description, max_waiting_count, created_at, modified_at, address) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{category}, #{name}, #{description}, #{maxWaitingCount}, #{createdAt}, #{modifiedAt}, #{address})
